0pt">), all you have to do is:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">brew update<o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Compiling MariaDB<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue Light",sans-serif;

0pt">You can then run searches (</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family:

0pt">brew info mariadb</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;

color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">. When you're ready to install MariaDB,
simply execute:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">brew install mariadb<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue Light",sans-serif;

0pt">As of </span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="https://mariadb.com/kb/en/mariadb-526-release-notes/"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue Light",sans-serif;

0pt">, it will pull in readline, and the output will be similar to below:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lovegood:~ byte$ brew install
mariadb<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Warning: It appears you have
Macports or Fink installed<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Software installed with other
package managers causes known problems for<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Homebrew. If formula fail to build

Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">affected formula.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:13.0pt;font-family:"Monaco",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
Monaco;color:#262626;mso-font-kerning:0pt">This formula is keg-only, so it was
